means: 执事长（教会中神职人员的一种职位）

sentence.Network_en: The archdeacon thinks that such a correspondence is disgraceful.
sentence.Network_cn: 会吏长认为这样通信是不光彩的.

sentence.Network_en: There is one point I would like to mention, Mr. Archdeacon.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一点我想提一提, 会吏长先生.

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Arabin's bright eye twinkled as he caught that of the archdeacon.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿拉宾先生目光炯炯地瞥到会吏长的两眼时;闪烁了一下.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 1870年，父亲是圣公会的会吏长（archdeacon）（Archdeacon）。1885年赴英国学习法律。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... archbishopric 大主教之职 archdeacon 执事长 archdeaconate 副主教的职位.
跟我背词典270... ... arch-criminal / 罪魁祸首 archdeacon / 【宗】副主教 archdiocese / 大主教管区.
[3] 会吏总(archdeacon)是英国国教会(或称圣公会)的牧师, 地位仅次于主教(bishop), 其职务为协助主教监督其他牧师的工作.[4] 他的回.

list.abs: archdeacon 执事长archdeaconate 副主教的职位archdeaconry 副主教之职

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  arce-, ercediacon, from ecclesiastical Latin archidiaconus, from ecclesiastical Greek arkhidiakonos, from arkhi- 'chief' + diakonos (see deacon)

entry.tran: （尤指圣公会的）会吏长，副主教
entry.def: An archdeacon is a high-ranking clergyman who works as an assistant to a bishop, especially in the Anglican church.

means.word_mean: 1. (Anglican Church) an ecclesiastical dignitary usually ranking just below a bishop
